data.displayName: No Feed-In + Yello Diamond: Variable Prices (estimate)

fees.description: Membership of $25 per month (inc. GST) to access these wholesale rates.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date
An $3 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information

electricityContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, visit https://www.amber.com.au/terms. If you do not have a smart meter we will install one for you. Available to residential customers in the Evoenergy distribution region with a flat rate tariff and without a solar or battery system. For illustrative purposes, tariff 010 assumed. Our bill guarantee sets the maximum average rates we charge over a calendar quarter. For general usage this is 36.42c/kWh.

discounts.description: Welcome credit of $210 applied over 12 months. New residential customers only who are also customers of CommBank (CBA) in the Yello Diamond segment and link their CBA credit card or bank account as Amber payment method. Customers are ineligible to receive any remaining credit months if they cancel their Amber account, switch their payment method to a non-CBA account, or their CBA card expires. Additional eligibility requirements apply, see Amber website.

electricityContract.variation: Prices are not fixed. Amber passes through wholesale electricity prices directly at cost, including: wholesale energy costs, hedging costs, network charges (per kWh and per day), metering costs, environmental costs and carbon offset costs. The usage price here is an estimate based on the median wholesale prices paid in the last 12 months for non solar Amber customers in your network. Annual price estimate includes Amber monthly subscription fee. Visit www.amber.com.au/how-it-works

eligibility.description: Welcome credit of $210 applied over 12 months. New residential customers only who are also customers of CommBank (CBA) in the Yello Diamond segment and link their CBA credit card or bank account as Amber payment method. Customers are ineligible to receive any remaining credit months if they cancel their Amber account, switch their payment method to a non-CBA account, or their CBA card expires. Additional eligibility requirements apply, see Amber website.

greenPowerCharges.description: 100% GreenPower for 3.01 cents/kWh (inc. GST) option avaliable. See website for more information.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Amber Offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Standard fees are listed www.amber.com.au/fees, but additional service costs passed through from distributors may vary.
